name: Nebs 'n Debs
description:
Nebs 'n Debs is a new game for the original Nintendo Entertainment System. Run, jump, and dash your way through 12 levels as you search for the missing parts of Debs's ship to escape the hostile alien planet Vespasian 7MV! Nebs 'n Debs runs on the same type of game cartridge as the original Super Mario Bros.

Features
  • 12 unique levels
  • HAAAAARRRRRDDDDDDDDD Mode (unlocked after beating all 12 levels)
  • Run-jump-dashing-platforming-crystal-collecting action
